function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of studies on urban green spaces in developing countries","Impact":"Ineffective urban planning and policies, potential negative effects on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Conducting future studies tailored to the local context in developing countries","Technologies":"Research and data collection methods","People":"Future urban populations in developing countries","Owner":"Research institutions and government agencies"},{"Description":"Transferability of empirical evidence from developed to developing countries","Impact":"Inaccurate application of findings, potential exacerbation of negative consequences","Mitigation":"Conducting specific studies in developing countries, validation of findings in different contexts","Technologies":"Cross-cultural research methods, data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Role of perceived safety in urban green spaces","Impact":"Impaired restorative experience, decreased mental health benefits, reduced visitation in dangerous neighborhoods","Mitigation":"Improving safety measures in green spaces, community engagement, urban planning for safe environments","Technologies":"Safety infrastructure, surveillance systems, community engagement platforms","People":"Urban residents, local authorities, urban planners","Owner":"Local government, urban planning agencies"}]}
